channel.title: Runic Blueprints
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Runic Blueprints"

item.title: Re: Runic Blueprints
item.content:encoded: I can confirm that it is a non-worthless rune and Not Wasteland Disease. The mission itself isn't clear though.

item.title: Re: Runic Blueprints
item.content:encoded: I've read you must have a non-worthless rune and also have Not Wasteland Disease.

item.title: Runic Blueprints
item.content:encoded:
For the Runic Blueprints special mission, does anyone know what exactly the requirements are to open it?

The wiki page says they're Season 3+ and a Top-Level Wasteland Ingredient (which, unless I'm mistaken, is a non-worthless rune), but if that was all, I'd have access to the mission. I'm currently Season 3 and I have a Snake Rune and a Wolf Rune.

Is it possible that the mission requires a certain rank (ie. Jonin)? (I'm a Sp. Jonin right now.)
Or is it possible that the mission requires Not Wasteland Disease? (I don't have that either.)
